column4: hello, I'm using Ubuntu 11.04, I want to enable rewrite-mod how?
hello, I'm using Ubuntu 11.04, I want to enable rewrite-mod how?
hello, I'm using Ubuntu 11.04, I want to enable rewrite-mod, how?
sudo a2enmod rewrite ?
I did this but no effect!
restarted apache ?
yes, I did!
does "sudo a2enmod" say something about rewrite ?
e2enmod says: Module rewrite already enabled
then it is. how do you test?
I put a .htaccess with rewriteMod on, but no effect in this folder!
please trywith apache config file, maybe it is just your .htaccess which is not parsed
how?
write your config into your apache vhost file
I'll copy the same .htaccess statements to httpd.conf files, OK?
however you prefer to configure your vhosts
I'm trying in my personal machine
however you configure your vhosts in your personal machine :)
I've just installed apache2 and don't know a lot about it.
check your apache config for the vhost
OK, I'll search more
yepp
start with a proper apache vhost conf, as soon as that works, go into detail with rewrite etc
OK, I'll
